DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read identity risky user information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read identity risky user information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all identity risky user information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the identity risky user information for your organization without a signed in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write risky user information
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. Update operations include dismissing risky users.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write identity risky user information
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for all users in your organization on your behalf. Update operations include dismissing risky users.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all risky user information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for your organization without a signed-in user.  Update operations include dismissing risky users.
